dialogue.text: Each day the world got greyer, falling away – life and colour, words and people. Faces turned blank until everyone looked the same, people I knew and those I didn’t.
Each day got shorter and each night got longer, until a sleep settled on me that fell like ash, and was too heavy to lift.
In my nightmares, I fought to wake, but everything I did made it darker. I couldn’t escape on my own. I didn’t know where to go. All I knew was I had to follow it through to the end.
